channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Ghoul , The Admiral/The Pirate & The Executioner/The Outlaw
channel.description:
> # [color=gray]The Ghoul[/color] > **[color=gray]Neutral Support[/color]** > > **Day Ability (Afterlife)** - Become Immune to Death at Night.(5 Uses) > > **Night Ability (Helping Hand)** - Gives the Target an additional buff , based on their class.(Infinite Uses - See CW's "Empower") > **Goal:** *Survive.*
> # [color=steblue]The Admiral[/color] > **[color=steblue]Blue Dragon Killer[/color]** > > **Passive (Seven Seas)** - Immune to Occupation and Redirection. > > **Day Ability (Hunt For Fish)** - Target a player. Anyone targeting that player will be occupied(Prevented - Does NOT bypass Occupy Immunity). You will be notified if you have caught anything.(Infinite Uses - Will stay on the targeted player if you don't charge targets. ~ Counts as visiting) > **Day Ability (Break)** - Target yourself to stop **Hunting For Fish!**.(Infinite Uses - May Not Use **Hunt For Fish** on the same player "after you broke your fishing rod and net.") > > **Night Ability (Check The Nets)** - You will get a list of players who visited your **Hunt For Fish!**'s target. You may decide if you want to kill one of them or release all of them.(Infinite Uses ~ Does NOT count as visiting) > **Night Ability (Sail Into The Unknown)** - You will be Immune to all of the attacks. Your attackers will be caught is a **Fish Net** , preventing them to use any abilities the next day.(2 Uses) > **Goal:** *Defeat [color=purple]The Unseen[/color]/[color=darkred]The Cult[/color] and any [color=gray]Neutrals[/color] that seek you harm.* > > **[color=purple]Converts[/color] into** > > # [color=purple]The Pirate[/color] > **[color=purple]Unseen Killer[/color]** > > **Passive (Master of The Sea)** - Immune to Occupation and Redirection. > > **Day Ability (Deadly Fishing Nets)** - Decide if you want to lay out **Deadly Fishing Nets** tonight. If you lay out **Deadly Fishing Nets** , anyone visiting you will be bled.(1 Use) > **Day Ability (Loot Room)** - Occupy a player tonight(Does NOT bypass Occupy Immunity) up to 3 Nights.(2 Uses - You will decide when to kill your target. The Target can NOT die if it has Occupy Immunity) > > **Night Ability (Fishing Rod)** - Trap an **[color=purple]Unseen[/color]** member's room. If they get visited by an Investigative class , all visiting players will die.(1 Use) > **Night Ability (Pet Parrot)** - Target player won't be able to visit **[color=purple]The Unseen[/color]** tonight.(Infinite Uses) > **Goal:** *Defeat [color=steblue]The Blue Dragon[/color] and any [color=gray]Neutrals[/color] that seek you harm.*
> # [color=steblue]The Executioner[/color] > **[color=steblue]Blue Dragon Killer[/color]** > > **Day Ability (Protect The King)** - Decide if you want to protect The King Tonight. If The King uses **Order Execution** while you are protecting The King , you will enter **Attacking Mode**. If The King does NOT use **Order Execution** , you will enter **Defense Mode**.(3 Uses - **Attacking Mode** - You will guarantee that **Order Execution** will kill The King's Target. **Defense Mode** - You will kill any attackers visiting The King and you will die if The King is attacked.Once Selected , Your Night Abilities will be Disabled for tonight.) > > **Night Ability (Aid From An Expert)** - If the Targeted player is a **Killer** class , you will grant them Conversion Immunity and you will guarantee that their attacks can not be healed.(4 Uses - CAN NOT TARGET KING) > **Night Ability (Execution)** - Occupy a player(Does NOT Bypass Occupy Immunity). They will executed the next night.(Infinite Uses) > **Goal:** *Defeat [color=purple]The Unseen[/color]/[color=darkred]The Cult[/color] and any [color=gray]Neutrals[/color] that seek you harm.* > > **[color=purple]Converts[/color] into** > > # [color=purple]The Outlaw[/color] > **[color=purple]Unseen Support[/color]** > > **Passive (Wanted)** - If investigated by The Sheriff , they will learn your exact role. > > **Day Ability (Shootout)** - Anyone visiting **[color=purple]The Assassin[/color]** tonight will die.(1 Use) > > **Night Ability (Hiding From The Law)** - Abilities against you tonight will be prevented.(2 Uses) > **Night Ability (Last Stand)** - Kill 1 player or assist **[color=purple]The Assassin[/color]** to secure a kill.(1 Use - Assisting **[color=purple]The Assassin[/color]** will bypass Healing/Occupying/Immunity etc) > **Goal:** *Defeat [color=steblue]The Blue Dragon[/color] and any [color=gray]Neutrals[/color] that seek you harm.*

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Ghoul , The Admiral/The Pirate & The Executioner/The Outlaw
item.dc:creator: NAOtheRitualist
item.description:
The Ghoul

Neutral Support

Day Ability (Afterlife) - Become Immune to Death at Night.(5 Uses)

Night Ability (Helping Hand) - Gives the Target an additional buff , based on their class.(Infinite Uses - See CW’s “Empower”)
Goal: Survive.

The Admiral

Blue Dragon Killer

Passive (Seven Seas) - Immune to Occupation and Redirection.

Day Ability (Hunt For Fish) - Target a player. Anyone targeting that player will be occupied(Prevented - Does NOT bypass Occupy Immunity). You will be notified if you have caught anything.(Infinite Uses - Will stay on the targeted player if you don’t charge targets. ~ Counts as visiting)
Day Ability (Break) - Target yourself to stop Hunting For Fish!.(Infinite Uses - May Not Use Hunt For Fish on the same player “after you broke your fishing rod and net.”)

Night Ability (Check The Nets) - You will get a list of players who visited your Hunt For Fish!'s target. You may decide if you want to kill one of them or release all of them.(Infinite Uses ~ Does NOT count as visiting)
Night Ability (Sail Into The Unknown) - You will be Immune to all of the attacks. Your attackers will be caught is a Fish Net , preventing them to use any abilities the next day.(2 Uses)
Goal: Defeat The Unseen/The Cult and any Neutrals that seek you harm.

Converts into

The Pirate

Unseen Killer

Passive (Master of The Sea) - Immune to Occupation and Redirection.

Day Ability (Deadly Fishing Nets) - Decide if you want to lay out Deadly Fishing Nets tonight. If you lay out Deadly Fishing Nets , anyone visiting you will be bled.(1 Use)
Day Ability (Loot Room) - Occupy a player tonight(Does NOT bypass Occupy Immunity) up to 3 Nights.(2 Uses - You will decide when to kill your target. The Target can NOT die if it has Occupy Immunity)

Night Ability (Fishing Rod) - Trap an Unseen member’s room. If they get visited by an Investigative class , all visiting players will die.(1 Use)
Night Ability (Pet Parrot) - Target player won’t be able to visit The Unseen tonight.(Infinite Uses)
Goal: Defeat The Blue Dragon and any Neutrals that seek you harm.

The Executioner

Blue Dragon Killer

Day Ability (Protect The King) - Decide if you want to protect The King Tonight. If The King uses Order Execution while you are protecting The King , you will enter Attacking Mode. If The King does NOT use Order Execution , you will enter Defense Mode.(3 Uses - Attacking Mode - You will guarantee that Order Execution will kill The King’s Target. Defense Mode - You will kill any attackers visiting The King and you will die if The King is attacked.Once Selected , Your Night Abilities will be Disabled for tonight.)

Night Ability (Aid From An Expert) - If the Targeted player is a Killer class , you will grant them Conversion Immunity and you will guarantee that their attacks can not be healed.(4 Uses - CAN NOT TARGET KING)
Night Ability (Execution) - Occupy a player(Does NOT Bypass Occupy Immunity). They will executed the next night.(Infinite Uses)
Goal: Defeat The Unseen/The Cult and any Neutrals that seek you harm.

Converts into

The Outlaw

Unseen Support

Passive (Wanted) - If investigated by The Sheriff , they will learn your exact role.

Day Ability (Shootout) - Anyone visiting The Assassin tonight will die.(1 Use)

Night Ability (Hiding From The Law) - Abilities against you tonight will be prevented.(2 Uses)
Night Ability (Last Stand) - Kill 1 player or assist The Assassin to secure a kill.(1 Use - Assisting The Assassin will bypass Healing/Occupying/Immunity etc)
Goal: Defeat The Blue Dragon and any Neutrals that seek you harm.

Read full topic
item.source: [Class Suggestion] The Ghoul , The Admiral/The Pirate & The Executioner/The Outlaw
